message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I need to prioritize my target profit. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum value. I'm willing to meet you at $1250000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you need to prioritize your target profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a compromise.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $1200000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'm willing to offer you the product at $1175000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you'll consider it a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to offer $1150000, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
